items.sentence: We\'re going to eat at a Chinese restaurant tonight.
Tom almost always gets home from school before 5:30.
Tom can\'t drive a car so he always rides a bicycle.
Tom can\'t remember exactly where he parked his car.
Let\'s check with Tom and see what his problems are.
Let\'s find someone who really knows how to do this.
Let\'s go out and have a good time with our friends.
I hope you won\'t make the same mistakes as Tom did.
I\'ve decided not to do that until after Tom leaves.
I\'m going to figure out a way to blame this on Tom.
Tom drinks at least three liters of water every day.
Tom dropped in at the pub on his way home from work.
Tom emptied the contents of the sack onto the table.
You haven\'t been studying French as long as I have.
You haven\'t done that as much as Tom has, have you?
I\'d appreciate it if you would turn off the lights.
I\'d like to exchange this shirt I bought yesterday.
I\'ll ask Tom that question the next time I see him.
I\'ll give you a call as soon as I arrive in Boston.
None of you have any clue what Tom\'s going through.
